channel.title: New help with 2 easy things
channel.description:
1)how do i make it so like when people r fighting in wild and if dey keep massing it will hit more i wanna make it so if dey mass it likes every 5 secs or something etc. but like for whip differnt speed for dharoks differnt speed
same with specs i wanna make the specs slow 2 because in the server runescape 3 verison 3 the special for zammy godsword hits high and if u keep pressing spec the more it will and k0 so i wanna change it kinda confusing but help
2)i need help with the way whip attack i wanna make it like runescape any ideas my whip attack is like this right now
[URL=http://s59.photobucket.com/albums/g320/marsel4life/?action=view&current=clip0022.flv][IMG]http://i59.photobucket.com/albums/g320/marsel4life/th_clip0022.jpg[/img][/URL]
